iZoss· 
-Privacy and Data Security 
Ross recognizes our responsibility 
to appropriately use, maintain, and safeguard the personal data we collect from our Customers and Associates. 
Our data security and privacy practices are 
designed to support privacy rights and are based on industry standards. 
Visit our Privacy Policy for more information. 
58 Ross Stores, Inc., 2020 Corporate Social Responsibility Report
